info.title: GoPro External Integration REST Services - API version 1.0

post.summary:
Register or update a room booking in public registry by court.
If room booking by specified court and external id is already published then it is updated

delete.summary: Delete a room booking entry from public registry.

parameters.name: courts
parameters.description: Published bookings per court/s. If no values provided bookings for all courts will be returned.

parameters.name: lawyer
parameters.description:
Optional parameter lawyer. If empty: Return all bookings (no filtering). 
            If lawyer is provided: Return only bookings where at least one lawyer matches provided name string.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: Number of returned bookings per page(Default is 20)

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Booking start date and time. Example(2025-07-01T14:00:00)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Booking end date and time. Example(2025-07-01T14:30:00)

API: 1.0

Adds or updates a list of active lawyers in the database.
If a lawyer with the specified identifier already exists, their information is updated; otherwise, a new lawyer is inserted.

parameters.name: requestData
parameters.description: The request containing the list of lawyers to add or update.

get.summary:
Retrieves all active lawyers from the database.
This endpoint returns the list of lawyers currently registered in the system.

get.summary: Authenticate with username and password. Returns authenticationToken that is used when calling other API methods. API: 1.0
Authenticate with username and password. Returns authenticationToken that is used when calling other API methods. API: 1.0

post.summary:
Search verdicts.
Using advanced key search and multiple criteria parameters.
Use "orderBy" expression parameter. Syntax: sort_field [ ASC | DESC ] [ , ...n ]
Supported fields for sort_field: { Court | Casetype | CaseNumber | Category | Title | VerdictDate | PublishDate }
Samples: "Court ASC", "Court, VerdictDate DESC"

get.summary: Get a detailed verdict data specified by unique ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the published verdict

post.summary:
Register or update a verdict in public registry by court, external case id and number, title and announcement date.
If case by specified court and external id is already published then it is updated

Upload a PDF representation of the verdict.
Unique id of the published verdict: verdictID
Base64 encoded content of the PDF document: content

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message
Additional message containing information or error message
Additional message containing information or error message

primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary contact for a case

organization.description:
Name path or ID of organization to search for the case template.
Use special word "all" (lower case only) to look in all organizations.
Skip parameter or pass empty to assume current user organization

journalKeys.description: Optional collection of related journal keys

contacts.description: List of clients (individuals or companies) who will be linked to the case by different roles. If client is not registered (missing from system) - they will be created first

searchInactiveContacts.description: Optional. When true then searches for both active and inactive contacts. Default: false

documents.description: List of document attached under case

ignoreDefaultEmployees.description:
When false then default employees for the case template are ignored and not assigned to the case on creation.
When true default workers are added. Note that this flag has no effect on handling the ResponsibleEmployees list.
These are always assigned to the case.

responsibleEmployees.description: List of users that will be assigned as responsible workers for the case. The case template (see <seealso cref="P:GoPro.EIR.Requests.CreateQuickCaseRequest.Template" /> property) specifies default set of responsibles which may or may not be added to the case. See <seealso cref="P:GoPro.EIR.Requests.CreateCaseRequest.IgnoreDefaultEmployees" />

isPrimary.description: Gets or sets binary flag for the journal key being a primary for the target

valueType.description: Data type of the metadata (0: String (default), 1: Guid; 2: Integer; 3: DateTime; 4: Boolean; 5: Decimal (currency))

LinkedRoleContact.description:
Contact information. Used in relation with cases
where multiple contacts can be linked by specific role and priority

primary.description: Flag that shows whether contact is primary for the case (main involved party). Can be either false/true or 0/1 or nei/j or no/yes

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of an existing contact

name.description: Full name of the person or company

type.description: Type of client. Possible values: Individual, Company, Contact
Document class name. One of the values in "Document classes" GoPro list

fileName.description: File name of the document content uploaded

content.description: Binary content represented as Base64 encoded string

ResponsibleWorker.description: Represents a GoPro user. Used for denoting a case responsible worker

primary.description: Flag that shows whether this user is the primary responsible for the case. Can be either false/true or 0/1 or nei/j or no/yes

organization.description:
Name path or ID of organization to search for the case template.
Use special word "all" (lower case only) to look in all organizations.
Skip parameter or pass empty to assume current user organization

journalKeys.description: Optional collection of related journal keys

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

responsibleEmployeeName.description: User names of main responsible worker for the case

responsibleEmployeeID.description: Record ID of main responsible worker for the case

coResponsibleEmployees.description: List of other responsible workers for the case

publishTo.description:
Publish targets. A combination of one or more values:
ShowGeneral, ShowCitizen, HiddenIndividual, Teams

creationDate.description: Date and time of case creation

createdByName.description: Name of the user who created the case

modifiedDate.description: Date and time of latest edition

modifiedByName.description: Name of the user who last edited the case

closingDate.description: Date and time when the case was closed.

metaDataEntries.description: List of related metadata with values

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of the case in GoPro system

valueType.description: Data type of the metadata (0: String (default), 1: Guid; 2: Integer; 3: DateTime; 4: Boolean; 5: Decimal (currency))

caseId.description: Record id or case number of target case

metadata.description: Collection of associated metadata values with definitions

overwrite.description:
Flag to control full overwriting of properties
When true - all properties are cleared and reset with the new value. Missing properties will be cleared to empty/default value(s). Object should be retrieved first before updating
When false - only passed arguments will be updated.

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

contactIdNumber.description: National identification number or GoPro record ID of target client that is expected to be linked to cases

caseTemplate.description: Name of case template to filter results. Optional. If not specified, cases of all types are searched.

caseNumber.description: Case number or record id (GUID) of the target case

customerID.description: Record ID of the contact (individual/company) who needs to be linked

role.description: Role name for this contact relation. See "Roles" list in GoPro system for predefined roles

parentID.description: Record id of parent object to search under

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

NamedReferenceResponse.description: General GoPro reference response with name

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

caseNumber.description: Case number or record ID of the parent case

parentID.description: Record ID of the immediate parent under which will be placed this folder. When this is not the top case then <seealso cref="P:GoPro.EIR.Requests.CreateFolderRequest.CaseNumber" /> is required

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of the client

Individual.description: Data model for GoPro person (individual) partner

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of the client

companyID.description: GoPro record ID of the company represented by this person

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of the client

GetClientRequest.description: Request for a single client (individual or company)

identifier.description: Identity number (SSN) or unique record ID (GUID) of the client

searchInactive.description: Optional. When true then search for inactive clients as well. Default is false.

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message
Additional message containing information or error message

contactId.description: Unique record ID (GUID) of the contact or identity number (SSN) of the related individual

companyId.description: Identity number (SSN) or unique record ID (GUID) of the company which is represented by the individual

searchInactive.description: Optional. When true then search for inactive contact/company as well. Default is false.

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

caseNumber.description: Case number or record ID of the parent case

parentID.description: Record ID of the immediate parent under which resides the document. When this is not the case itself then CaseNumber is required

content.description: Binary content that will be uploaed. Represented as Base64 encoded string

caseNumber.description: Case number or record ID of the top parent case

parentID.description: Record ID of the immediate parent under which will be placed the form. When this is not the top case then <seealso cref="P:GoPro.EIR.Requests.CreateFormRequest.CaseNumber" /> is required

contact.description: Client (individual or company) who will be linked to the form. If client is not registered (missing from system) - they will be created first

LinkedContact.description:
Single contact information. Used in relation with forms, documents, etc.
where only a single contact can be assigned

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of an existing contact

name.description: Full name of the person or company

type.description: Type of client. Possible values: Individual, Company, Contact

metadata.description: Collection of associated metadata values with definitions

overwrite.description:
Flag to control full overwriting of properties
When true - all properties are cleared and reset with the new value. Missing properties will be cleared to empty/default value(s). Object should be retrieved first before updating
When false - only passed arguments will be updated.

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

creationDate.description: Date and time of form creation

createdByName.description: Name of the user who created the form

modifiedDate.description: Date and time of latest edition

modifiedByName.description: Name of the user who last edited the form

metaDataEntries.description: List of related metadata with values

id.description: Unique record ID (a GUID) of the case in GoPro system

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message

body.description: The content (body text) of the memo

caseNumber.description: Top parent case number or record ID.

parentID.description: Record ID of the immediate parent under which memo resides. When this is not the case itself then CaseNumber is required

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message
Additional message containing information or error message

verdictID.description:
Record ID of the immediate parent.
Matches both container case in GoPro and verdict ID from the custom table.

content.description: Binary content that will be uploaed. Represented as Base64 encoded string

message.description: Additional message containing information or error message
